website_summaries.verdict: An easier to use wrap than Boba but doesn't provide enough features to warrant the price.
pros: A hardware-free solution for those who want to enjoy close contact with baby on the go
cons: Some complaints that it doesn't feel totally secure

customer_reviews.title: We really liked the Moby as an introduction to baby wearing
customer_reviews.text: We really liked the Moby as an introduction to baby wearing. It's a cheap way to see if your baby likes being worn. With that said, once we discovered that our baby liked being worn, we moved on to the Solly and ring slings, as the Moby has a ton of fabric (compared to other carriers) and is really hot. Still a good budget choice! I don't regret this one at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pemi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pattern, but didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern of this wrap and it was not hard to tie after watching the videos, however my baby did not fit well in it and kept slouching down and disliked being wrapped tightly, So it did not work for me. That said the material is soft and it is good quality. I ended up getting the baby bjorn which does not have to be as tight on the baby to keep them in position and offers better support so that he doesn't slouch when I am carrying him.
customer_reviews.author: EHMartinez

customer_reviews.title: Wrap it as tight as your wife keeps telling you it needs to be
customer_reviews.text: After several wears in which my wife accused me of having it too loose, I finally "strapped" our little one down and it made all the difference! I don't like the origami aspect of getting the Moby set up and baby secured, but once you're locked-in it's great. Very light weight and doesn't take up too much space...and listen to your wife when she says to make it tighter, mama knows best!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Mayes

customer_reviews.title: I hate this wrap
customer_reviews.text: I hate it. It’s so hard to use - baby is hard to position in there right. If you tie it too tight or too loose you can’t adjust it without undoing the whole thing. Once in there my babies head isn’t really secured. Sure the fabric is soft and breathable and stretchy but this product sucks to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jazemond

customer_reviews.title: Needs frequent readjusting
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier aside from needing frequent readjusting. Seems like fabric stretches out after 15 minutes of wear and baby slips too low. Simply readjust straps and it’s fine, but a bit annoying when wearing for longer periods of time. Regular Ergo 360 with thicker fabric doesn’t have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with this wrap !!!
customer_reviews.text: The color is so beautiful, I am obsessed. Perfect stretch, the older generation of Moby didn’t not have enough stretch. Glad I gave them another shot. Definitely recommend by this mama 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not enough fabric
customer_reviews.text: Really was looking forward to trying this with my newborn. Unfortunately, there was not enough fabric despite it saying one size fits all. I’m 5’9” 200 lbs post-partum and the wrap barley tied around me. My husband is a lot thinner than I, him being 170 and even then there was not enough fabric for him.
customer_reviews.author: Demetria

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient and too long
customer_reviews.text: The wrap is gorgeous and comfortable but it was a headache to put on. It took too long to get on which was frustrating when my baby was fussy. It’s also SO LONG. It would definitely get dirty and drag across the floor if you’re trying to put it on outside and in a parking lot. It’s cute for photos but not an ideal carrier. I much prefer a more structured carrier like a Lille or ergo baby. I can get those on in just seconds vs messing with a wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Wondering what took me so long to buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap. Its super easy to use, lightweight and much better than my original carrier. My old carrier would immediately start hurting my back and I have no issues with this one. I wear baby so much more now since it's super easy.
customer_reviews.author: brownie06921

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Moby! It’s cooler to wear than the original fabric and I love that I don’t get as sweaty. There is a learning curve to use it, but it was easy enough to remember how to do it after watching a YouTube video. My newborn loves being in the wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little bit to get used to how put it on, but it’s great once you do. It’s a little on the small side, I’m 5’5” and 165 lbs, and I’m a little worried about this fitting when my newborn gets bigger. I am also not a fan of the way the warning tag was sewn onto the wrap, right into the hem. You’d have to take them out and re-sew it to take it off. And it’s in such a visible spot when you wear the wrap. Could have put it somewhere it wasn’t visible after putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: IttyBittyBelly

customer_reviews.title: Baby must have!
customer_reviews.text: Can not recommend Moby enough. Only thing that didn’t kill my shoulders and back when hauling around by big baby. The material is so soft and breathable. Anytime a friend has it on their registry I’m the first to sweep it up. Everyone should have it!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Snug and secure though it's too warm
customer_reviews.text: I love that the cloth allows enough friction to ensure it's safe and snug. However, I bought it as I thought it'll be more breathable and for my weather which is about 28-30 degrees Celsius, I need to be in air conditioning to use this otherwise it would be too hot for my baby. I used it while travelling to a cooler climate about 13-15 degrees and it worked perfect. (I had to take out her sweater though)
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this wrap! Was scared of getting one for fear of use, but it’s so simple and not really as complicated as I originally thought. Plus the style is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: seattlegirl

customer_reviews.title: LO's favorite wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is my LO's favorite carrier! He falls asleep within minutes of me putting him in it. The fabric is stretchy without being too loose and the pattern is super cute. I find it easier to use than my boba (though they are similar).
customer_reviews.author: amtem40

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love everything about this carrier: easy to use, love the color&material.
customer_reviews.author: cristina dobre

customer_reviews.title: In Love with Moby Evolution!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the moby evolution in “batik” color. The fabric is so soft and comfortable, with the perfect amount of stretch - even on a plus size body. Baby fits snugly into this wrap, and it fits both myself and my husband. I love wearing baby in this carrier! Even though the price is high, this is a must have item for any baby registry!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Quesnell-theno

customer_reviews.title: YouTube it
customer_reviews.text: We had to youtube it to figure out what we were doing wrong when trying to follow the instructions it came with. The baby is not a huge fan of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: My brother looks officially like a dad since I bought this and my niece looks content wrapped up in this.
customer_reviews.author: lala_Ichabod

customer_reviews.title: My newborn was super fussy at nights but putting her in the Moby ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what can I say, this has changed my nights completely. My newborn was super fussy at nights but putting her in the Moby has made our lives so much better. She sleeps in it and i have my hands back. Totally recommend 1000 times!
customer_reviews.author: Noiro

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to use, and super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I tried a few different brands and styles and never got the hang of it with my first. Now with my 2nd kid, I got this one and I love it. Don't know why it's different but it is. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice wrap, good length, fabric stretches easy
customer_reviews.text: My second baby won't stay anywhere other than my arms so a friend recommended the Moby wrap. I like it and did not find any issues with the length of the fabric as I read in other reviews. The fabric does stretch quite a bit and feels lose after 2-3 wears.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's great!! My baby falls asleep right away when I wrap her on me! We LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Depends on preference, it’s a lot of work
customer_reviews.text: If you know how to use this and are good at wrapping it around the night it’s great. The material was good as well but seemed complicated. I got it to work once but went with a different kind. It’s long also but once it’s wrapped around it won’t be.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is just as pictured and described. The material is soft and true to color. The length is great. Baby feels secure when using the wrap. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to easily pack this item wherever we go it’s super comfortable to wear and even when baby is not is you can use a a stylish scarf until baby goes in. It also supports being able to breastfeed while in carrier. Definitely would but more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Piwowar

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: material was very soft and easy to figure out once you fallow the direction on how to wear it. My 4week old passed out by just being in there for 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Baby gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a gift. My daughter-in-law specified this paticular brand and pattern. She loves its ease of use for mommy or daddy
customer_reviews.author: teri2lyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice and it works
customer_reviews.text: Nice and it works, the only thing is that theres a lot moree fabric lenght than it seems, so around the waist you'll have a lot of fabric that is not shown in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This Moby wrap is thick and heavy. Baby got very hot very quickly. We opted to return and buy a stretchier fabric wrap that was more breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all new moms who want to comfort their baby.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my cousin. Great gift for a new mom. Helps you to comfort your baby while living your life... And doing the dishes or shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Carriebella

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: For great granddaughter she used onebwith her first baby and loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The color is beautiful and the fabric is soft. It’s super comfortable and my favorite wrap.
customer_reviews.text: My son is now four months old , 17 lbs, and 26 Inches and I’ve been using it since he was two months old. It is still my go to and he loves it. I tried the boba wrap and it was a bit too stretchy and hurt my back. This one is perfect, supportive, and I wear it walk at parks, to concerts, and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit this large momma
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. I'm a big momma. I needed to make sure I has enough room to fit in. Fits perfect. It was very helpful at the zoo.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times and it is noce to have as long as my baby isn’t fussy. It did shrink quite a bit when I washed and dried. That may be my fault for putting it in the dryer. It’s comfortable to wear and very soft material.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: For dogs not babies
customer_reviews.text: Use this to carry around my chihuahua and he loves it. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Niks Picks

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: I put my daughter in a wrap or carrier pretty much every single day. She is 14 months old but very tiny for her age. I’ve used this wrap since the day we came home from the hospital and I LOVE it! We have 9 different prints/colors😬
customer_reviews.author: Riley Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Too long/bulky when folded. K'tan is better
customer_reviews.text: The color is true to the picture. The fabric is VERY soft. I preferred the K'tan Active to this wrap because the K'tan folds up much smaller to fit in my diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & TierneyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t know how great they were until I needed it
customer_reviews.text: My moby saved my life with my first!! It is my go to gift for showers now. I didn’t know how great they were until I needed it!!
customer_reviews.author: Caseylynn

customer_reviews.title: So comfy- easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So comfy- easy to use. Just make sure to watch video clips before use. My baby always falls asleep in this.
customer_reviews.author: HVK

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft and thick yet breathable it is. I feel relieved when I saw how comfortable my newborn was in it.
customer_reviews.author: Esme

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle secret
customer_reviews.text: So thus is Grandma and I had no problem figuring it out and snuggled her right in.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborna
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier, it allows me to move around and do stuff around the house while carrying my baby. It is also very comfortable for newborns,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: First time buying these and I got to say they are pretty easy to use. Comfy and my daughter loves to nap in it.
customer_reviews.author: darelis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, his mom says he enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: Dsam

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is so much softer than the cotton versions and breathable. Easy to tie on. Used this to go to the movies to keep baby close. Can also breast feed while he’s in this (see YouTube).
customer_reviews.author: Christina Burnett

customer_reviews.title: But the instructions on easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Intimidating at first. But the instructions on easy to follow. It can take some time for baby to adjust to it (which is true for anything new), but it works great and keeps baby close and warm.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rooker

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a baby shower. they live in NYC so I am sure this will come in very handy
customer_reviews.author: L. DeChino

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fabric. Very comfortable. Use this almost every day, at least once.
customer_reviews.author: R.Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Father Approved
customer_reviews.text: I'm a father of three and have used a Moby Wrap with each.
customer_reviews.author: S P

customer_reviews.title: Every new mom needs a good baby wrap
customer_reviews.text: Love the print of this wrap. It’s one of my favorite & most worthwhile baby purchases
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Literally carrying my son everywhere it is definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This wrap was easy to use after looking at some tutorial videos on YouTube. It’s super soft and comfortable. However, after one wash, I think it shrunk because I can’t tie it around as many times as before.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is just too thick
customer_reviews.text: Too thick! Way too hot for me and baby, even in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: nyc1234

customer_reviews.title: It’s like you need 2 people to get this on and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time getting my little wrapped up in this thing. It’s like you need 2 people to get this on and baby in correctly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I purchased the classic
customer_reviews.text: It’s much shorter than anticipated... won’t wrap around me as it should and won’t even fit my husband. I’m 5’8” and 135lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased as a gift! 😍
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift on a registry and I hope the new mom loves it once she begins using it.
customer_reviews.author: SDudt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great durable material. Even through washing, the material holds its shape and quality.
customer_reviews.author: D'Ondra

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was a baby shower gift and the mother to be loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline2921

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This wrap has been a lifesaver. Wish I bought one with my older 2 when they were babies.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabete Amaro

customer_reviews.title: Love Wrap
customer_reviews.text: I love my wrap. I'm a large woman and it fits me well. The fabric is stretchy so my baby starts moving lower after being in it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal  Casson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately got the wrong color, must have gotten swapped in a return or something so That’s a definite bummer BUT the wrap is incredibly soft, comfortable and the right amount of stretchy! I highly recommend it! It’s my first time using Moby wraps I’ve only used the ring slings until this one and I prefer it a lot more. The only con as I mentioned is the error in color (even though the box is right). I’m a 5’ 2 girl and my boy is 19lbs at 5 months and this is great! It’s not too long wraps perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: MBS23

customer_reviews.title: On time delivery
customer_reviews.text: This product was used as a gift for a perspective mother at a baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: mr unable to workwith my kindle

customer_reviews.title: Learning Curve
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is good quality--soft, stretchy material that feels like it would hold up for many, many years. I am having a lot of trouble getting the baby wearing thing down--baby always seems either too high or too low, wrap gets too loose, etc so I haven't been able to use it for long periods of time. I'm still working on my technique. In you do choose to purchase, keep in mind there's a learning curve with these wraps!
customer_reviews.author: Allison S.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this wrap! It's so comfortable and so easy to get the hang of how to wrap and hold baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used an early version of this carrier 40 years ago & the Moby is far superior.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, one I'll be very proud to give! I used an early version of this carrier 40 years ago & the Moby is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I use this wrap at home when ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use this wrap at home when getting stuff done around the house - it's lightweight for AZ and kiddo loves it. (Although not at first - took some getting used to on both our parts). Haven't tried to breastfeed from it yet but may give it a shot now that we're used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lovato

customer_reviews.title: My baby did not like it. Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Too cumbersome to put on. My baby did not like it. Had to return. It's a good product, just as described just too much trouble to put on especially with a cranky, crying baby. Just not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap, I used it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: nathan schmoll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have got baby loves it and it doesn't hurt the back!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Small Fabric..
customer_reviews.text: Small item! This fabric is for skinny moms.. if you are not size small or medium dont buy it ! Try the K'tana with specific sizes..
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrap
customer_reviews.text: The material is so soft. I am a visual learner so I had to find a video on youtube to figure out how to use it. But after that, it was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Goku Palace

customer_reviews.title: Very Confusing
customer_reviews.text: This was the most irritating thing ever!!!! Watched he YouTube video over ten times and still couldn't get it right or comfortable enough to let go of my baby!!! Went all the way around me and I'm a plus size mom!
customer_reviews.author: KortneyLL

customer_reviews.title: Love My Moby!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to use after following the directions. My son absolutely love the moby wrap and usually falls asleep as soon as I put him in it. Love my moby!
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift I’m sure she loved it she picked it out 😆
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift I’m sure she likes it she picked it out 😆
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

product_meta.title: Moby Wrap Baby Carrier | Evolution | Baby Wrap Carrier for Newborns & Infants | #1 Baby Wrap | Baby Gift | Keeps Baby Safe & Secure | Adjustable for All Body Types | Perfect for Mom & Dad | Charcoal
product_meta.description: Color:CharcoalPerfect for newborns, the close Evolution Wrap will help you bond your little one - even when you’re on - the - go. It offers an easy - to - use, hands - free way to evenly distribute baby’s weight across your back and hips, making for a comfortable carry and hassle - free adventures. For children 8-33 pounds.
feature_bullets: BABY WRAP THAT PROMOTES BONDING: Baby-wearing nurtures a powerful bond that can lead to calm, happy babies, while helping to reduce stress, colic, and even encourage breastfeeding. Allows you to keep baby uniquely close, warm, and secure

COMFORTABLE BABY CARRIER WRAP: A parent-favorite for its comfort, style and adaptability, the MOBY Evolution Wrap Baby Carrier is made from soft, stretchable and durable fabric that evenly distributes the weight of carrying baby across the back, shoulders, and hips
GROWS WITH BABY: This wrap for baby grows with your little one, supporting babies 8-33 lbs all while you stay hands-free!
BABYWEARING MADE SIMPLE: This baby carrying wrap is great for parents on the go-a hands free baby carrying experience

specifications.Material Type: BPA Free, Phthalate Free, Latex Free, Lead Free
specifications.Care instructions: Machine wash, gentle or delicate, hang dry, or use the lowest dryer setting.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars337 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
